comments: Although he\'s difficult to understand and so is his writing, he\'s a brilliant guy who simply wants students to learn and enjoy his class. The material was tough, but I always seemed to stay interested. Very helpful during office hours. He\'ll also take extra time out of his day to try and help you understand everything.

I couldn\'t stand this class when I took it. He is a nice guy and knows what he\'s talking about, but only if you can understand him. The man has a speech problem and his handwriting is one of the worst I\'ve seen. I don\'t know how I passed. I didn\'t learn anything and napped most days and STILL got a B.
